words.source: H199 waw + adv. ʾulam 'but, however'; KJV 'and in very deed', ESV 'but', NASB 'but, indeed'
H5668 prep. b- + n.ms ʿavur 'sake, purpose'; KJV 'for this cause', ESV 'for this purpose', NASB 'for this reason'
H2063 dem. pron. fs zoʾt 'this'; KJV 'this', ESV 'this', NASB 'this'
H5975 Hiphil perf. 1cs + 2ms suff. of עָמַד 'to stand'; KJV 'have I raised thee up', ESV 'I have raised you up', NASB 'I have allowed you to remain'
H5668 prep. b- + n.ms ʿavur 'sake, purpose'; KJV 'for to', ESV 'to', NASB 'in order to'
H7200 Hiphil inf. constr. + 2ms suff. of רָאָה 'to see'; KJV 'shew in thee', ESV 'show you', NASB 'demonstrate'
H853 direct object marker; untranslated in English
H3581 n.ms constr. koach 'power, strength' + 1cs suff.; KJV 'my power', ESV 'my power', NASB 'my power'
H4616 waw + prep. lemaʿan 'in order that, for the sake of'; KJV 'and that', ESV 'so that', NASB 'and in order that'
H5608 Piel inf. constr. of סָפַר 'to recount, declare'; KJV 'my name may be declared', ESV 'my name may be proclaimed', NASB 'my name may be proclaimed'
H8034 n.ms constr. shem 'name' + 1cs suff.; KJV 'my name', ESV 'my name', NASB 'my name'
H3605 prep. b- + n.ms constr. kol 'all'; KJV 'throughout all', ESV 'in all', NASB 'through all'
H776 art. + n.fs ʾerets 'land, earth'; KJV 'the earth', ESV 'the earth', NASB 'the earth'
